channel.title: Error message : AI Dis
channel.description:
When i play i have sometime a message call : AI Dis . This kind of message prevent me to be attack by all ennemies and i am like a ghost . However the mai nproblem is to i can not have any relation with other characters . The ydont move and dont talk to me .
I have realise a New game since the last update and the problem appears on the Level : Office complex just before the 2 nd turret .
I add a screenshot for explain .
PS : ca nyou tell me when we will see the zombies soldier ? ![Capture d’écran (3613).jpg|690x500](upload://AkraBrcx6rqcP3Dl3tByuYUNuxf.jpeg)

item.title: Error message : AI Dis
item.dc:creator: Gedruese
item.description:
gordon24:

everything is fine now

I don@t have installed any Mods. Is a clean bought “Black Mesa” Installation on Steam.

I try “ai_disable 0” on console, but nothing appears.

If i start a new Chapter Save, it works up to a new savepoint.
If i load this savegame, the message “A.I. Disabled” appears again.

Please help
Thx

Read full topic

item.title: Error message : AI Dis
item.dc:creator: gordon24
item.description:
I am now unsuscrible : The mod of the office complex is bug . i have delete the mod and everything is fine now

Read full topic

item.title: Error message : AI Dis
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
If you installed mods from MODDB or gamebanana, follow the instructions on those sites.

Unsubscribe from any workshop mods.

And also do the following:

Go to ***\SteamApps\workshop\content\362890 (where *** is the location to where your steam games may be)
And Delete all folders within this folder.

RESTART your computer.

After restarting your computer, Verify The Game Cache.

Read full topic

item.title: Error message : AI Dis
item.dc:creator: gordon24
item.description:
Can you tell me how to uninstal the mods ?

Read full topic

item.title: Error message : AI Dis
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
gordon24:

1 st : The bug is activate when i die

2 nd : How i can activate the consolle in the steam version of black mesa ?

3 rd : I have installed the mod if swith the english sub to french and the one call : Modification Pack: Office Complex through Blast Pit

4 rd : I also got another message ( see the screen shot )

5 rd : Can you tell me how the save can corrupt themselves ?

  1. Caused by incompatible mods.

  2. The tilde key . Enable the console in the advanced keyboard settings.

  3. Uninstall the mods.

  4. Node graph out of date, not a problem.

  5. The saves become corrupt due to incompatible mods.

Read full topic

item.title: Error message : AI Dis
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
Try just restarting an unlocked chapter from the New Game menu.

Do you have any mods installed?

Type this in the console “ai_disable 0” without the quotations.

If still no luck try verifying the game cache.

Read full topic

item.title: Error message : AI Dis
item.dc:creator: gordon24
item.description:
I have restart the whole game : Gordon arrive at the complex and the bug is stil here , currently the bug appears on the part :administrative complex and we got hostile after to we kill the 1 st marines .

Read full topic

item.title: Error message : AI Dis
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
AI Disabled is normally caused by a corrupt save.
Restart an unlocked chapter from the New Game menu to fix.

Read full topic
